question: Which of the following is/ are the objectives of Odisha PVTG Empowerment and Livelihood Improvement Programme (OPELIP)?
option1: To improve the food and nutrition security of tribal people
option2: To improve livelihood of the tribal people
option3: To improve agricultural practices and promoting  micro-enterprises
explanation: OPELIP was implemented in twelve districts of Odisha. Its objectives are improvement of agricultural practices and promoting micro-enterprises for income generation, improvement of livelihood of the tribal people, improvement of the food and nutrition security of tribal people.
